title: Looking for Duo (Silver 2 - Gold 5)
body:
Hi guys,

Looking for a reliable support who wants to duo and climb consistently, someone who will voice-chat, isn't afraid to speak up and call shots or listen to the calls I make, and isn't a douche. I understand we all have bad games, but I don't wanna sit there while you BM their jungler for 20 minutes cause we got ganked. 

Add me in-game if you guys want a chat
IIMammothx

*Edit - Pref 18+, I myself am 21.

replies.body:
Hey,

I'm currently in silver but main top/sup.

I'm 25, never flame and are keen to do some duo.

hit me up if you want to play.

IGM: Monkeyman414

S2 Sup/Mid Main main, I up for this if you want to duo with me.
IGN: Kitty Katt
